directions: Beat shortening and vegan butter together with an electric mixer until well combined and fluffy. Add powdered sugar and beat for about 3 minutes more.
Add hemp milk and vanilla extract; continue beating until fluffy, 5 to 7 minutes.
ingredients: ½ cup vegan butter (such as Earth Balance®)
3 ½ cups powdered sugar, sifted if needed
title: Vegan Buttercream Frosting
